Prime Day deals on Apple hardware end tonight. [Amazon/Apple]

Day 2 of Amazon's Prime Big Deal Days sale is well underway, and we've handpicked the best discounts on Apple products, along with third-party monitors, smart home gear, and more to snap up before the deals run out.

The deals are broken down by category below or you can jump straight to Amazon's sale page to view the assortment of offers. In our curated list, we've scoured deals across Apple resellers to save you time and money, so you'll find only the best offers from Amazon, Best Buy, B&H, and Adorama.

Top 5 Prime Day deals across Apple resellers

  • AirPods Pro 2 with USB-C: $168.99 ($81 off) with Prime
  • Apple Watch SE 2 GPS with 40mm Aluminum Case (select colors): $169.99 ($80 off)
  • M3 13" MacBook Air (10-core GPU, 16GB RAM, 512GB SSD): $1,249 ($250 off)
  • M3 15" MacBook Air (10-core GPU, 16GB RAM, 512GB SSD): $1,424 ($275 off)
  • M4 iPad Pro 11-inch (256GB, Standard Glass): $849 ($150 off) with My Best Buy Plus

Jump to your favorite category

  • AirPods, Beats, HomePod & Bose
  • AirTag
  • Apple Watch
  • iPad & Apple Pencil
  • MacBook Air & MacBook Pro
  • iMac, Mac mini & Mac Studio
  • Displays
  • Smart home
  • Accessories

AirPods, Beats & popular headphones

AirPods Pro 2 and AirPods Max are hot sellers.

Amazon's $168.99 AirPods Pro 2 deal is Prime-exclusive, but for Prime members, it represents the lowest price on record for Apple's bestselling earbuds. Beats have also gotten fresh markdowns on Day 2 of Prime Big Deal Days, and AirPods Max with USB-C (new for September 2024) are on sale for the first time. You can compare prices in our AirPods & Beats Price Guide.

AirPods

  • AirPods Pro 2 with USB-C: $168.99 ($81 off) with Prime

AirTag deals start at just $24.

Before you know it, holiday travel will be in full swing and not having a pack of AirTags on hand can leave you frazzled. Amazon is running discounts on both the single pack and 4-pack, both of which can be found in our AirTag Price Guide.

  • AirTag: $24.99 ($5 off)
  • AirTag 4-pack: $79.98 ($20 off)

Apple Watch

Even the new Apple Watch Series 10 and black Apple Watch Ultra 2 are on sale.

Day 1 of the sale saw deals on the Apple Watch SE that went viral, and there's still time to pick up the wearable for as low as $169.99 for the sale ends tonight.

Apple Watches

  • SE 2 GPS with 40mm Aluminum Case (select colors): $169.99 ($80 off)

Apple's 2024 iPad Pro with an M4 chip is up to $200 off.

Amazon sold out of the popular $849 M4 11-inch iPad Pro deal yesterday, but Best Buy is running the same offer with a My Best Buy Plus membership. You can also still grab an iPad mini 6 for $349.99 at Amazon, the lowest price we've seen.
